description:
This month will have a special edition. We’ll move our typical Wednesday to Thursday, 10th of May, so we can fit in the Start & Scale Week agenda ( http://scaleupporto.pt/start-scale-2018/ ). 
As a special edition, we’ll also have a special agenda. We are organizing it together with Porto Design Accelerator ( https://portodesignaccelerator.com/) and Porto Tech Hub ( https://portotechhub.com/ ). 
AGENDA:
18:30 – Check-in, snacks and welcome
19:00 – Porto Design Accelerator Showcase – Meet the program and some startups
19:30 – Porto Tech Hub & Porto Tech Hub Conference
20:00 – Networking drinks with Port Wine
name: Porto Startup Coffee Meetup #74
